540730.name: Slayaway Camp - Deluxe Edition DLC Pack
540730.description:
LOVE SLAYAWAY CAMP? WANT MORE STUFF?


This special deluxe edition package of bonus content includes a variety of non-game (and a couple cosmetic in-game) items that complete the Slayaway Camp experience.

WHAT'S INCLUDED?


By purchasing the package, you will receive immediate downloadable access to:

  • The Full-Length Slayaway Camp Soundtrack in 320kbps MP3.
  • Unlock an Exclusive In-Game Killer: Poorly received "urban" Skullface revamp from the shelved Slayaway Camp XII: Skullz in Da Hood
  • Unlock an Exclusive In-Game GorePack: The Streetsweeper
  • Exclusive set of Slayaway Camp Wallpapers & Avatars.
  • Set of Slayaway Camp Papercraft Templates including Skullface, American Mary, Mouthy Jock, and Cheerleader
  • The Complete Poetry Audiobook Version of Skullface's "Journal of Die-Ku" Featuring over 20 hilariously morose Haikus read by Mark Meer.
  • Authentic Scans from Skullface's own "Journal of Die-Ku".
  • A folder full of artistic bits and pieces, concept sketches, videos and other treasures from the development of Slayaway Camp.
  • Official Animated Music Video for "Only the Strong Survive" by GNÜ TRUNTION

We leave you with an excerpt from Skullface's "Journal of Die-Ku"...
540730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
